name: chickenswamp (5/10)
description:
controls:
* arrow keys: move
* Z: undo
* R: restart

made for day 5 of https://itch.io/jam/vmj2020, following this theme:

Thanks to the members of the Thinky Puzzle Games Discord for feedback, encouragement, and ideas brainstorming!

Bonus level! thanks to Karoo for prodding me to make it, and for some key ideas that made the translation work. The puzzle itself is not mine -- it was designed by the creators of Rush Hour. I just translated it into my chicken-crocodile engine: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=58254eafb0a2fcb3ba5028a3c0e60b6f

If you want to see the source code, or want a puzzlescript.net link for some other reason, here you go: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=20f1454dd73bc74a67277af1f2a5dc21
